pullrequest.title: Link to tool for automatic mesh geometry computation and cleanup.

content.raw:
Nice! The coke can now works for me! A couple of other issues I noticed:

* Many (most?) of the other meshes on the model database are not "watertight" so we don't get results. For example, the `ambulance`, `bowl`... Not a problem with your tool, I think we should clean up those meshes.
* For the meshes that work, I first get results with mass == 1.0, but when I change the mass and click "Update", I don't get any results

I have a feature request, is the code publicly available somewhere with an issue tracker? :) I think it would be convenient if the output was already formatted in SDF, for example for the coke can:

~~~
<inertial>
  <!-- Volume: 6.6642197270e-03 -->
  <pose>-1.1383210000e-02    -1.3927920000e-02     6.1967289000e-01 0 0 0</pose>
  <mass>1.0</mass>
  <inertia>
    <ixx> 9.1921404545e-03</ixx>
    ...
  </inertia>
</inertial>
~~~
